Research scientists of the BRAIN (Brain Research & AI for Neuroimaging) team study, as expected, how artificial intelligence can resolve unmet needs in neuroimaging analysis at clinical setting. [About us]
• VUNO BRAIN (Brain Research and AI for Neuroimaging) team is a group of enthusiastic, proficient, and warm-hearted AI Researchers. Also, you may participate in active collaboration opportunities with fellow researchers in VUNO as well as medical doctors in South Korea / Worldwide.

Research Scientists at VUNO lead our efforts in developing novel algorithmic architecture towards the end goal of solving unmet needs in various clinical practices.
